interpolated: ES: A text where I interpolate {count} times
number: ES: My favorite number is {n, number}
pluralized: ES: I have {count, plural, =1 {one cat} other {{count} cats}}
pluralized-with-hash: ES: I have {count, plural, one {just # cat} other {# cats}}
selected: ES: {gender, select, male {He is a good boy} female {She is a good girl} other {They are good fellas}}
